Jessica Blizzard

  • View Resume

Software Engineer

Jessica Blizzard is a Software Engineer with a strong background in interactive applications. She has over eight years of software development experience with over four years of experience in video game development and over four years of experience in mobile application development with multiple released titles in both industries. She is able to write efficient, object oriented code for multiple platforms and she can also analyze, debug and maintain code to the company's standards. She have a proven track record of successfully releasing titles in a timely manner. She has a strong understanding of what makes an intuitive and aesthetic user interface (UI). Her passion is for making games and giving users a streamlined, fun and engaging experience.

Designer Templates

We've crafted some handsome templates for you to use. Go ahead and click 'Continue to layouts' to browse through them. You can easily go back to edit your page before publishing. After publishing your page, you can revisit the page generator and switch to another theme. Your Page content will be preserved.

Creating pages manually

If you prefer to not use the automatic generator, push a branch named gh-pages to your repository to create a page manually. In addition to supporting regular HTML content, GitHub Pages support Jekyll, a simple, blog aware static site generator. Jekyll makes it easy to create site-wide headers and footers without having to copy them across every page. It also offers intelligent blog support and other advanced templating features.
